name: Skyfire Soar
description: A high-speed rollercoaster that launches riders through glowing fire loops and into the clouds.

name: Neptune's Plunge
description: A water coaster that dives deep into an underwater world filled with mythical sea creatures.

name: Dragon's Descent
description: A free-fall tower where riders 'ride' a dragon plummeting into a medieval castle.

name: Jungle Stampede
description: A safari jeep ride where guests dodge wild animals and cross rickety rope bridges.

name: Phantom Heights
description: A spooky ferris wheel with eerie sights and ghostly surprises at each turn.

name: Temple of the Forgotten King
description: A dark ride where explorers venture into a cursed ancient temple full of booby traps.
